Reviews.Content: dirtiest bathroom ive ever seen i stayed at wingsing hotel rm 1505.i was so shocked when i saw the bathroom . veryyyyyy dirttyyyyyyyy....and the blacket so itchy.then i called the housekeeping to clean the bathroom,still dirty. i suggest if you like to stay at budget hotel bridal tea house yaumatei is much better.
Reviews.Author: janey1979
